original_title: Royal recover from early losses, on course for win
original_body_lines: Royal College recovered from an early hiccup to stay on course for victory in the 46th Mustangs Tophy encounter against S. Thomas' College being played today at the SSC Grounds.
After 20 overs, Royal were 86 for 2, with 80 runs required in 30 overs.
Royal lost two wickets in the third over of the innings, but the unbroken partnership of 62 in 92 balls between Uvindu Weerasekera and Rehan Peiris steered their team to a comfortable position.
Royal College 86/2 in 20 overs (Uvindu Weerasekera 35 not out, Rehan Peiris 30 not out)
